testcase.name: SupportsDynamicType

failure.message: Text controls should respond to system requests for Type Size changes.

testcase.failure:
Learn more about this issue: https://mobile-docs.deque.com/attest/ios/supports-dynamic-type.html
Guidelines: 0: Platform Guideline
Properties: overridesTraitCollectionDidChange: false isInTableViewCell: false supportsAutoAdjustment: false className: UILabel inheritedType: textElement text: This text will never adjust. respondsToContentSizeNotification: false adjustsFontForContentSizeCategory: false

testcase.name: SupportsDynamicType

failure.message: Text controls should respond to system requests for Type Size changes.

testcase.failure:
Learn more about this issue: https://mobile-docs.deque.com/attest/ios/supports-dynamic-type.html
Guidelines: 0: Platform Guideline
Properties: overridesTraitCollectionDidChange: false isInTableViewCell: false supportsAutoAdjustment: true className: UILabel inheritedType: textElement text: This text adjusts when app is first opened. respondsToContentSizeNotification: false adjustsFontForContentSizeCategory: false
